description: The All-in-one Floating Contact Form WordPress plugin before 2.1.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

product.name: All-in-one Floating Contact Form, Call, Chat, and 50+ Social Icon Tabs
